channel.title: the last word on Argolon Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in the last word on Argolon Solutions

item.title: Fundraising Discussion on The Last Word
item.description: On Tuesday, I was on TodayFM’s The Last Word radio show with Professor Frank Roche talking to Matt Cooper. The topic was centered on fund raising in the current economic climate. You can hear what we had to say in this audio clip. The interview starts about 4 minutes 30 seconds in. Don’t forget that our 2008 BES offering is open until Dec 31st. The response to-date has been very positive.
